name: Super Luggage Box!
description:
A small game made during Unity Hackweek 2018 using Unity for small things and ECS. Our goal was to learn about those features by making a game.

WASD (or Swipe on mobile) to move the character. Push boxes onto the conveyor belt to deliver them to the passengers waiting outside.

Created by:

  • Chris Pacey (Unity)
  • Richard Haylands (Unity)
  • Rob Sheridan (Unity)
  • Saana Korhonen
  • Morgan Paul (Boss Alien)
